name: runtracker
description: A modern, feature-rich mobile application for tracking your running and walking activities. Built with Capacitor for native Android experience.

scripts.build: echo "Web app is already built - copying to www..." && cp index.html styles.css script.js www/
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: npm run android:sync && npx cap build android
scripts.android:run: npm run android:sync && npx cap run android
scripts.android:run-device: npm run android:sync && npx cap run android --target device
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npx cap sync android

author: RunTracker Team
